original_text: And for that the dream was doubled unto Pharaoh twice; it is because the thing is established by God, and God will shortly bring it to pass.
korean_text: 바로께서 꿈을 두 번 겹쳐 꾸신 것은 하나님이 이 일을 정하셨음이라 하나님이 속히 행하시리니

sentences.original_text: And for that the dream was doubled unto Pharaoh twice
sentences.korean_translation: 그 꿈이 바로에게 두 번 반복된 것은

sentences.original_text: it is because the thing is established by God
and God will shortly bring it to pass
